content: Resuming to build Adrian's maze game idea from Dec 29
Adrian's ideas are INCREDIBLE! 6-year-old who loves chess, science, space - now wants a complex videogame!
Creating project folder: /Users/scottwofford/build/adrian-maze-game
Created README.md with game concept. Creating GitHub repo.
Created QUESTIONS_FOR_ADRIAN.md - design questions to answer with Adrian
GitHub repo created: https://github.com/LuthienResearch/adrian-maze-game
Answer the questions with Adrian
Create GitHub tree diagram so Adrian understands what GitHub is
Created TREE_EXPLANATION.md with ASCII art tree showing branches, trunk, roots
Adrian answers: 2D side-scroller, arrow keys, 2 players, race to exit
Documented Adrian's answers. Making technical recommendations.
Creating initial project structure with Phaser 3 game engine
Created index.html and game.js with basic 2-player movement
Game ready to play! index.html + game.js + HOW_TO_RUN.md
Add project structure like luthien-proxy (dev/, tests/, context/)
Creating organizational structure inspired by luthien-proxy
Created: dev/OBJECTIVE.md, dev/TODO.md, dev/NOTES.md, dev/context/, tests/
Committed project organization structure
Created PROJECT_STRUCTURE.md - visual guide to all folders
Run the game so Adrian can test it
Starting python3 -m http.server 8080 for Adrian and Gabriel to test
